General.Name: Hotron Precision Electronic Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Hotron Precision Electronic Industrial Co.,Ltd. manufactures and supplies various wires and cables for signal transmission, telecommunication, IT, power, auto, medical appliances, and other industries in Taiwan. It offers electronic, electric, and other wires and cables. The company also provides copper rods, wires, and fine wires; tooling for metal press/plastic injection; metal pressed work products; insulation composite Mylar Al. foils; and various wire cables and PC board connectors. In addition, it offers terminals, wire assemblies, and molds; PVC plastic formulations and pellets; and plastic extrusion and injection products. Hotron Precision Electronic Industrial was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
